About This Home

Meet a rare opportunity to own 1 acre of land in the heart of the Ledger community. With mountain views, this property is ready for your vision—whether it's building your dream home, creating a short-term rental retreat, or simply holding onto a beautiful slice of Western North Carolina.

The existing home on the property needs to be removed, but the true value lies in the unrestricted land—offering endless possibilities with no zoning limitations. Enjoy peaceful surroundings, year-round views, and the convenience of being just minutes from Bakersville, Spruce Pine, the Blue Ridge Parkway, or the Appalachian Trail. The Middle and High School for the county are about .5 a mile away.

Listing Agent

Kelly Pittman Jones

North Carolina Mitchell County Bakersville 28705

74 Jarrett Dr, Bakersville, NC

This home is located at 74 Jarrett Dr, Bakersville, NC 28705 and is currently priced at $62,500. This property was built in 1986. 74 Jarrett Dr is a home located in Mitchell County with nearby schools including Gouge Elementary School, Bowman Middle School, and Mitchell High School.
